resources.string: Seems your gps locations service is off !
Exception is recorded. Check the Crashes and Exceptions on Google Dashboard!
The app will crash now! Check the Crashes and Exceptions on Google Dashboard!
Fragment is loaded! Check the screen view on Google Analytics Dashboard.
Click on each button to see the appropriate tracking on Google Analytics
